title: Creature in the Well
notes: Native controller support **Decky Plugin: Works out of the box**. **2.0 Standalone: Works out of the box**.
genre: Adventure, Indie, Puzzle, Arcade, Pinball, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Fighting
description: A top-down, pinball-inspired hack and slash dungeon crawler. Venture deep into a desert mountain to restore power to an ancient facility.
